title: Zero-Based Budgeting
instructions: Learn the zero-based budgeting method where every dollar has a purpose.

sections.title: What is Zero-Based Budgeting?
sections.content: Zero-based budgeting assigns every dollar of income a specific job before the month begins. Unlike traditional budgeting that might leave 'extra' money unassigned, zero-based ensures intentional use of every dollar...

sections.title: Creating a Zero-Based Budget
items: List all expenses (needs first, then wants)
Assign every dollar to a category

key_takeaways: Every dollar must have a purpose
Gives you control over your money
